subject: Ordering to Poland
description_text:
Hello,

I am looking at upgrading my rig with Your Simsonn pedals but i have a
problem at check out.
I do not see Poland as a country I can choose from at delivery.
Do You not ship to Poland?
If You do how do I choose Poland as a destination?

Kind Regards,
Paul

conversations.body_text: Hi Pawe≈Ç Karny,  Customers in Poland can place orders directly through our Polish distributor, and the products will be shipped locally from Poland  https:/fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product_brand=Simsonn
